Producer: Philipp Kreuzer, Astrid Kahmke, Ulrich Stiehm, Helge Sasse, Sidney Kimmel
Production Co: Scope Pictures, Sidney Kimmel Entertainment, Kaminski.Stiehm.Film GmbH, Elzévir Films, Bavaria Pictures GmbH München-Geiselgasteig
Synopsis: In Paris, a suicidal widower (Michael Caine) and a sunny dance teacher (Clémence Poésy) become friends, but their bond may not be enough to ameliorate the widower's grief.
Title: Last Love
